message.content:
cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.IR. 

The paper deals with visual understanding of long-term and multi-camera captured videos using a restricted visual Turing test. It proposes a vision system that integrates different vision modules, a knowledge base and a query engine to perform joint video and query parsing. The paper also provides a benchmark dataset and a toolkit for ontology guided story-line query generation. Given these aspects, the most likely sub-category is computer vision (cs.CV), followed by artificial intelligence (cs.AI), computational linguistics (cs.CL), machine learning (cs.LG), and information retrieval (cs.IR).
